TopicTitle: Black Screen/Textures Flicking+Resource id out of range in getresource

Articles.Content:
I am running KSP RO RSS with Principia.

I had problems with it, but this one's new. Sometimes, the textures will flick to black. For instance, the stars will turn black, the orbit map will turn black, or the ship itself would flickle from being visible to black. I also noticed that a LOT of "resource id out of range in getresource" shows up on the debug mode. But I have no idea how to identify the problem that cuases it. Any tips?
